resources.string: Like a sprout growing into a big tree.\nYour steps will change the whole world.
Thanks to you,\n the Earth is recovering its health.
The mother orangutan in the woods \nmet the baby orangutan.\nThank you for your help!
Penguins on the glacier dance freely!\nThank you for protecting this vast glacier.
Please protect the polar bear\'s house.
Please consider the environment more.\nI believe in you.
You saved your loved one\nfrom the climate crisis.

Today, I had a class to make pengui dolls with
 paper cups in kindergarten.
 I had so much fun.
 I wrote down how to make it below.
 〈 How to make 〉
 1.Prepare 2 paper cups, thread, and colored paper.
Oh, my God. You did a great job. \n I am going to make one.
Today, we collected only plastic \n and separated all the labels.
Today, I had so much fun making \na penguin doll with a paper cup \nin kindergarten.
